RA TA Grader.subject: Inquiry About TA/Grader Opportunities
RA TA Grader.body:
Dear Professor ,

I am reaching out to inquire about potential Teaching Assistant (TA) or Grader opportunities in your department.

With a strong background in Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn), SQL, Data Science, and Machine Learning, I have experience in data analysis, visualization, predictive modeling, and business intelligence. My technical skills, combined with problem-solving and analytical abilities, make me well-suited to assist with coursework, grading, and student support.

If there are any TA or Grader positions available for the current or upcoming semesters, I would appreciate the opportunity to contribute and gain further academic experience. Please let me know if we could discuss this further at your convenience.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Jeel Kakadiya
📧 jkakadi1@asu.edu | 📞 +1 602-620-3572 | 🔗 LinkedIn | 🌐 Portfolio
